div.label: How will my donation be used?
div.div: Your donation will be used for the selected fund, and we guarantee its rigorous management. We are committed to investing 80 to 100% of donations for the benefit of children. You will find all the information in our annual report.

div.label: Is my donation tax deductible?
div.div: Compassion is an organisation recognised as being of public utility. In all Swiss cantons, donations made to Compassion can be tax-deductible. In January, Compassion will send you a donation certificate.

div.label: Can I pay by payment slip?
div.div: Of course you can. Just send us an email to together@compassion.ch and we will send you the necessary material by post.

div.label: What happens when I reach my goal?
div.div: First thing: We celebrate! Second thing: your project can continue to exist and thus collect more donations and find other sponsors for the children. It remains visible on the platform to inspire future project creators.

div.label: What happens if I don't reach my goal?
div.div: It doesn't matter: we celebrate! All donations will be allocated to the chosen fund, just as the children can look forward to finding a sponsor.

div.label: What about my personal data?
div.div: Compassion Switzerland takes data protection seriously. Compassion Switzerland does not share your personal data with any third parties and does not use it for any other purpose than for internal communication. Compassion has its own database and manages its own contacts.

div.label: Do you have any further questions?
div.div: If you have any further questions, you can simply write an email to together@compassion.ch.
